t: Amazon.com: VIG Furniture Modrest Mali Modern Wood & Glass TV Stand for TVs up to 79" in White : Home & Kitchen
s: The Modrest Mali Modern White TV Stand features a sleek white high gloss finish and a black glass with open back shelves for easy cord hiding. It features two (2) drawers with soft-closing mechanisms for more storage and has an aluminum support.

t: Amazon.com - VIG Furniture Modrest Jordan 18" Modern Rubber Wood & Fabric Dining Bench in Gray - Table Benches
s: A stunning blend of Walnut finished solid Rubber wood and fabric upholstery, the Modrest Jordan Modern gray and Walnut Dining Bench is a sight to behold. Featuring a tufted back, it has an open space between the seat and the back for an airy feel.

t: Collection Modrest by VIG | NFOUTLET
s: We'd also like to mention the neo-classical pearl white Italian Tall Chair – you'll feel like a little Napoleon at home. Modrest is an Italian bedroom collection - displaying a striking grandeur at an affordable price, made with the highest standard of quality materials.
